nodes.text: Tarine tea was a variety of tea. It was could be served with Sweet-sand cookies.

Rondai-2 and Christophsis were locations where the tea was served. As Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi attempted to stall for time during the Battle of Christophsis, he asked the enemy commander, General Whorm Loathsom, for some refreshments while they negotiated and was obliged with a cup of Tarine tea.
